item.title: things with buzzers: playing Jeopardy!
item.description: tl;dr: For the things with-buzzers series we have integrated a Jeopardy! Game show frontend to have a good time with friends. Check it out at things with buzzers: Jeopardy!. Start playing today, and have an awesome time!
